i18n.longDescription:
The Guest is a gloomy adventure full of enigmas where exploration of your surroundings comes to prominence; puzzles, secrets and riddles will help you discover who has locked you in this somber hotel room and most importantly, why.

Key Features:

Immersive storytelling. The mood and the feel of the game, and the mysterious background of the Doctor Evgueni Leonov, makes it a unique experience. You’ll travel through the character story and discover unexpected places that make you wonder what’s going on. The sci-fi story behind those enigmatic walls creates a powerful gameplay experience.

Environment. Set in an unkempt building in the 80s, The Guest confronts you with a dark and mysterious environment, creating a unique bond between you and the atmosphere.

Gameplay experience. Combining mechanics from classic adventures with puzzles and narrative, you’re led deeper and deeper into the plot. There are events where you’ll control the character in a critical mental state, breaking the game’s rhythm and looking for new experiences.

A quality soundtrack with a sometimes calm, sometimes hair-raising rhythm provides endless mystery and suspense.

Additional Features:
  • Roam and explore the surroundings, accessing every corner of each room.
  • There are different puzzles and enigmas to solve, each one with its own personality and complexity.
  • Unique events inside the storyline increase immersion in the game.

i18n.systemRequirements:
OS: Windows XP or Higher (32-bit or higher)
Processor: Core 2 Duo E6750 (Dual Core) 2.66 GHz or better
Memory: 4 GB of RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT, ATI Radeon 4800 or Higher
DirectX: DirectX 9.0
